nodes.text: Albea was a Human female scientist who worked for the Galactic Republic during the Cold War, and was imprisoned for unknown reasons by Voontara Fa'athra in his palace.
The resurgent Sith Empire placed a bounty on her, which was claimed by the future Grand Champion of the Great Hunt during the hunter's quest for sponsorship from Suudaa Nem'ro.
The player has the option to spare Albea instead of claiming the bounty on her, as she is not a required target of the Great Hunt.
